bug.short_desc: namespace branch: ListView_9.html error in drag and drop handling

long_desc.thetext:
In ListView_9.html the drag and drop handling does not work and throws the following error:
qx.ui.listview.ListViewPane[HASHCODE:135] 008781: Could not dispatch event of type "dragstart": TypeError - e.getOriginalTarget().getManager is not a function at http://nra/nra/qooxdoo/source/demo/test/ListView_9.html:201 at qx.core.Target.js:231 at qx.core.Target.js:245 at qx.core.Target.js:193 at qx.event.handler.DragAndDropHandler.js:357 at qx.event.handler.DragAndDropHandler.js:277 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:858 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:682 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:47

The first error trace was created by a modified drag and drop handler. Here is the original error trace:
qx.ui.listview.ListViewPane[HASHCODE:135] 011390: Could not dispatch event of type "dragstart": TypeError - e.getCurrentTarget().getManager().getSelectedItems().copy is not a function at http://nra/nra/qooxdoo/source/demo/test/ListView_9.html:201 at qx.core.Target.js:231 at qx.core.Target.js:245 at qx.core.Target.js:193 at qx.event.handler.DragAndDropHandler.js:357 at qx.event.handler.DragAndDropHandler.js:277 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:858 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:682 at qx.event.handler.EventHandler.js:47
